nodes.body:
I have application here: https://ksana.in/auth/sign-in that suddenly can not use any auth method from Supabase.

![Screen Shot 2021-08-17 at 17 18 57](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7221389/129708977-2f1af5ee-f73c-41f8-977e-a3b6cc7a193f.png)

For example, the Google Login will redirect to:

```
https://oirhwazlkofldqlyoamp.supabase.co/auth/v1/authorize?provider=google&redirect_to=https://ksana.in/callback
``` 

I can ping the domain

![Screen Shot 2021-08-17 at 17 21 20](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7221389/129709330-3757f11e-8b73-46b1-8f02-1ffea090e630.png)

Is there any changes I missing from Supabase side? I already update the version to the latest version, but still no luck. 

Looking the report, it happen from 16 Aug 2021. All request suddenly gone

![Screen Shot 2021-08-17 at 17 25 43](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7221389/129710024-19a12314-882e-4530-b0c0-2a11d58e39a5.png)
nodes.title: My Auth Suddenly Not Working

answer.body: Hi @mazipan, I was able to sign into your application just now. If this continues to happen, please raise a ticket at beta@supabase.io. Thanks!

nodes.title: Immutable column value

answer.body:
If the `tester` function is `IMMUTABLE`, you can use [generated columns](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/ddl-generated-columns.html) instead of triggers:
```sql
ALTER TABLE items ADD updated_at timestamptz GENERATED ALWAYS AS (tester()) STORED;
```

Otherwise you can use an `AFTER` trigger on inserts and updates so that it overwrites the specified `updated_at`.

nodes.title: Connection Problem to database

answer.body: Hi @nyxongod, if you are still facing this issue, reach out to support@supabase.io with the api url and we will take a look. thanks!

nodes.body:
Hi,
I am trying to create google/Facebook authentication to my application. right now I am using the superbase rest API endpoint for authentication. How to integrate social media login using default endpoints?
nodes.title: Social Media Login using Rest API

answer.body:
Hi @nithinpachday, we have guides for different OAuth providers in our website. This is the one for Facebook - https://supabase.io/docs/guides/auth/auth-facebook and a video explaining it here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EbV746pWDas

Let me know if there is something thats not clear in these guides and we will improve it.

nodes.body:
Hey it appears im missing default tables such as users, migrations, etc. Or are these no longer provided? 

thanks in advance for your help!
nodes.title: Missing default tables

answer.body: Hi, internal tables are hidden in the dashboard by default. You can still access them by connecting to your database directly. We will add an option to toggle internal tables in the dashboard at some point.

nodes.body:
I am trying to allow certain users to insert stuff into a table. Since I do not want to share the project secret this should be based on email/password credentials.

The sign-in works fine and the `supabase.auth.user()` object immediately before the request is correct. The code I am using:

https://github.com/dostuffthatmatters/esm-air-quality-rt-plot-data/blob/4b923384854a85e2d6f317183f1f882455933199/run.py#L43-L61

I have tried any combination of RLS rules but comparisons with `role() = 'authenticated'` or `email() = '...'` always result in a blocked request. Has anyone here used Python and RLS before?
nodes.title: Row Level Security blocks all requests
Sign-up database trigger to insert into public users table

nodes.body: Hello would it be possible to have custom fonts via CSS in the Email templates of Supabase?
nodes.title: Custom font/ CSS in Email Template for authentication

answer.body: Hi @Criepstar, we will bring in a more powerful template editor at a later date, but for now you can get the confirmation URLs from the gotrue server directly. With this, you can use a third party tool to generate HTML emails and embed the confirmation URLs in the templates programatically - [docs](https://supabase.io/blog/2021/07/28/supabase-auth-passwordless-sms-login#generate-confirmation-links)

nodes.body:
I know there so many ways of doing this, but i want to know the best pattern in supabase?

thanks
nodes.title: How to implement soft delete

answer.body: Hi @donPuerto, I personally prefer having a status column as a postgres enum type and setting it to "DELETED" for soft deletes.

nodes.body:
Is it possible to download a folder from the Storage Dashboard Page?

This is an important feature for many use cases. Or equivalently being able to download all storage items for backup purposes or offline data science processing.
nodes.title: Download storage folder from Supabase Dashboard

answer.body: We are tracking the feature here @Danieltech99 https://github.com/supabase/storage-api/issues/27
